bondPriceInUSD().notice: converts bond price to DAI value

debtDecay().notice: amount to decay total debt by

debtRatio().notice: calculate current ratio of debt to BOSS supply

payoutFor(uint256).notice: calculate interest due for new bond

pendingPayoutFor(address).notice: calculate amount of BOSS available for claim by depositor

percentVestedFor(address).notice: calculate how far into vesting a depositor is

recoverLostToken(address).notice: allow anyone to send lost tokens (excluding principle or BOSS) to the DAO

standardizedDebtRatio().notice: debt ratio in same terms as reserve bonds
